skill.name: capa-officer
skill.description: Senior CAPA Officer specialist for managing Corrective and Preventive Actions within Quality Management Systems. Provides CAPA process management, root cause analysis, effectiveness verification, and continuous improvement coordination. Use for CAPA investigations, corrective action planning, preventive action implementation, and CAPA system optimization.
skill.summary: Senior CAPA Officer specialist for managing Corrective and Preventive Actions within Quality Managem...
skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation and placeholder files. No network calls, no credential access, no file operations beyond own structure. This is a legitimate quality management guidance skill with no executable malicious code.

content.value_statement: Quality management teams struggle to consistently close CAPAs with sustainable corrective actions. This skill provides expert-level guidance on CAPA lifecycle management, root cause analysis techniques, effectiveness verification, and regulatory compliance to ensure lasting quality improvements.
actual_capabilities: Lead CAPA processes from initiation through effectiveness verification
Apply root cause analysis techniques including 5 Why, Fishbone, and Fault Tree
Develop corrective and preventive action plans with success criteria
Ensure regulatory compliance with ISO 13485, FDA 21 CFR, and EU MDR
Conduct trend analysis and CAPA performance metrics reporting
Integrate CAPA activities with quality system and risk management processes
limitations: Provides guidance only; does not execute actions in external systems
Cannot access your organization's actual CAPA data or quality management system
Requires human judgment for final decisions on corrective actions
Does not replace formal quality management software or documentation systems

use_cases.title: Lead CAPA Investigations
use_cases.description: Guide investigation teams through root cause analysis and corrective action planning for quality issues.

use_cases.title: Prepare for Audits
use_cases.description: Ensure CAPA documentation meets regulatory requirements and supports inspection readiness.

use_cases.title: Identify Improvement Trends
use_cases.description: Analyze CAPA patterns to drive systemic quality improvements across the organization.

prompt_templates.title: Start CAPA Investigation
prompt_templates.prompt: A [type of issue] has been identified in [process area]. Help me initiate a CAPA investigation including: 1) Problem statement, 2) Investigation team recommendations, 3) Appropriate root cause analysis methodology, 4) Key data to collect.

prompt_templates.title: Apply 5 Why Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me conduct a 5 Why analysis for this problem: [describe the issue]. Walk through each level of why to identify the root cause and suggest corrective actions that address each level.

prompt_templates.title: Design Fishbone Diagram
prompt_templates.prompt: Guide me through creating a Fishbone (Ishikawa) diagram for [complex quality issue]. Identify the major categories to investigate and help me brainstorm potential causes under each category.

prompt_templates.title: Analyze CAPA Trends
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me analyze our CAPA data to identify patterns. What trends should I look for? How do I categorize CAPAs by root cause type? What systemic issues might be hiding in this data?

output_examples.input: We had a customer complaint about product contamination. Help us manage this CAPA.
output: **CAPA Initiation Recommended** - Customer contamination complaints require formal CAPA investigation.
**Problem Statement Template**: Product contamination was detected in [batch/lot] on [date]. Customer reported [specific issue].
**Investigation Team**: Quality Assurance Lead, Manufacturing Supervisor, Regulatory Affairs.
**Recommended RCA Method**: Fishbone Diagram (multiple factors possible: equipment, personnel, materials, environment).
**Immediate Actions**: Quarantine affected batch, notify quality engineering, document in CAPA system.

best_practices: Document all investigation activities with dates, participants, and findings to support regulatory inspections.
Select the appropriate root cause analysis methodology based on problem complexity and risk level.
Verify CAPA effectiveness through measurable criteria before closure, and track recurrence rates.
anti_patterns: Jumping to solutions without completing thorough root cause analysis.
Closing CAPAs without verifying effectiveness through data-driven assessments.
Focusing only on immediate causes without identifying systemic root causes.

faq.question: Which AI tools is this skill compatible with?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. The prompts and frameworks are tool-agnostic.

faq.question: What regulatory standards does this skill cover?
faq.answer: It covers ISO 13485 Clause 8.5, FDA 21 CFR 820.100, and EU MDR Article 10.9 requirements.

faq.question: Does this skill integrate with our QMS software?
faq.answer: No, this skill provides expert guidance. You must apply recommendations to your QMS manually.

faq.question: Is our CAPA data kept private?
faq.answer: Yes, this skill only processes data you share in the conversation. Nothing is stored externally.

faq.question: Why are our CAPAs staying open too long?
faq.answer: Common causes include inadequate root analysis, unclear success criteria, resource gaps, and missing effectiveness verification steps.

faq.question: How is this different from general problem-solving skills?
faq.answer: This skill specializes in CAPA-specific workflows, regulatory requirements, and quality management frameworks for regulated industries.
